name: Sweet Story Bad Girl
description:
Insolent look, rebelle bow, and finally painted walls? Shame the hooligan, let her know her place. This bad girl must be punished!

The game contains a free DLC

Press "Ctrl + F" to get an easy win
or you can win by yourself to get a special hardcore achievement.



Sweet Story Bad Girl is a puzzle game in which you must collect all pairs of pictures to reproduce the image.

Enjoy lush pictures, great music, and leisurely gameplay with Bad Girl.
